message: It's the Ruins on the cape.
There’s nobody here, and it doesn’t look like any shady rituals are going on, either.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold……
A cold wind is blowing through the Ruins, almost as if it's keeping people away.
There’s nothing around to block the wind, so the icy gusts mercilessly steal the warmth from my body.

name: Gardner
message: Let's go wander around over there for a bit.
It's not really my intention to get in your way.
It’s the Ruins at the tip of the cape.
Now that Old man Marsh is no longer in this world, there’s probably no one else who’d visit these ruins.
遺跡のまわりには海からの冷たい風が吹き寄せ、誰の目にも触れる事がなくなった古代の遺物達は、人知れず崩壊への道を歩んでいる。

name: Gardner
message: We troublemakers will step out for a bit.
Call me when it's time to go home.

name: Thomas
message: Hey, make sure you cheer her up real good.
If this keeps up, I’ll end up looking like the bad guy for taking you there, won’t I?

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold.........
A cold wind blows through the Ruins, almost as if it's trying to keep people away.
There’s no cover around here to escape the wind, and the icy wind mercilessly strips the heat from my body.

name: Gardner
message: I'm gonna go take a little walk around there.
I’m not really interested in the Ruins anymore these days.

name: Thomas
message: Don't just do whatever you want, it makes me look like a nuisance.
It's like I'm getting in the way of you two.

name: Gardner
message: If that's what you think, why don't you go wander around over there yourself？

name: Thomas
message: Aren't you overthinking things？
These two sleep in the same Bed every night, after all.

name: Gardner
message: Then just do whatever you want.

name: Thomas
message: Got it.
Hurry up, will ya? It's freezing here, I can't take it.

name: Gardner
message: Call me when you're going home.
I don't wanna be left behind, alright?
The black, slimy-looking glossy stone pillars seem to resemble the style found in the temples scattered across the islands of Greece.
However, there's no way these ruins were brought over from Greece.
Philip was trading with countries in Asia and Africa, so these ruins must've been brought from there too, I'm sure of it...
But as an amateur, I don't have enough knowledge to back up that theory.
Even a pro like Gardner is stumped, so there's no way I could ever solve that mystery.
The pillar, made of a slimy-looking glossy black stone, surrenders itself to the slow waves of collapse, without being noticed or questioned by anyone.
It's a building that seems to be a Temple, with a majestic, somewhat unapproachable atmosphere.
I wonder if the consciousness of the people who revered this building as a key part of their faith lingers here-the sight of it even stirs fear in me.
Marsh said that by bringing these ruins to Arkham, Philip made quite a fortune.
No doubt, bringing something like this here couldn't have been easy, so I guess he expected a proper reward in return...
遺跡とフィリップが得た大量の金との間にどんな関係があるのだろう。この遺跡を奉っていた人々がフィリップに金を与えたのだろうか。
The gravekeeper said the Dagon Cult came to the village because of these ruins.
Then, the temple-like buildings and the murals painted above them were probably made for their gods.
Even so, it's weird that the believers aren't coming to the Ruins.
If it's a place where someone enshrined their own god, it wouldn't be strange to visit it almost every day.
寒風が吹きすさぶ遺跡の周囲には、人間はおろか上空を飛ぶ鳥の姿さえ見つける事が出来ない。
The sound of waves crashing against the cliffs just below is almost deafening, making the lonely atmosphere of the cape feel even more desolate.
Surrounded by massive Ruins and listening to the terrifyingly loud sound of the waves, I’m reminded once again of just how tiny I really am.

name: Thomas
message: You were pretty quick, huh.
Is it already all done？

name: Thomas
message: Hey, is she in a better mood now？
At times like that, you just gotta apologize.

name: Gardner
message: Did you get to talk things over without rushing？
You don't have to worry about us, you know, it's okay if you two stay alone together even longer？

name: Cordelia
message: What a lonely place this is...
We're the only living things moving around here.

name: Cordelia
message: Shall we get going already？

name: Cordelia
message: Being here makes me feel like I want to die.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold... Let's go home already.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, let's call the professor and Thomas.

name: Cordelia
message: Talk to me.
Cordelia suddenly brought it up.
Their expression is stiff, showing clear anger.

name: Jonathan
message: It's not like I go to places like that because I want to, you know.

name: Cordelia
message: あんな所に何があるって言うのよ。
No way, it couldn't be that Dunwich's daughter is alive and working as a prostitute, right？

name: Jonathan
message: もしも生きていたとしたら、もう６０過ぎの老人だろ　　　　　　　　う、そんな事はあり得ないよ。

name: Cordelia
message: Then why did you go?

name: Jonathan
message: The other night, on the way to your room, I saw Thomas talking with Nai in front of the Church of Dagon.

name: Cordelia
message: 教会で？
Why do you have any business going to a place like that, Thomas?

name: Jonathan
message: I was curious too, so I asked about it. After all, Thomas is a totally mysterious guy, you know. Maybe he's actually an old acquaintance of Nai or something.

name: Jonathan
message: I figured the reason you came to Arkham probably had something to do with the Dagon Cult.

name: Cordelia
message: So, what did Thomas say？
No way he just confessed that easily, right?

name: Jonathan
message: Thomas said that on his way back from the 'good place' that night, he happened to be stopped by Nai.

name: Cordelia
message: So that 'good place' was a brothel, huh.
So, the place you said you went out to with Thomas last night was actually the brothel, huh.

name: Jonathan
message: I thought that if I found out Thomas was lying, I might be able to get that guy to spill why he keeps hanging around us.

name: Cordelia
message: So, how did it go?

name: Jonathan
message: The prostitute who was with Thomas last night said she thinks Thomas might be impotent.

name: Cordelia
message: Impotent... what's that mean？

name: Jonathan
message: Basically... um... it means he's a cripple in that sense.
It means a man who can't do it with women.

name: Cordelia
message: Ah, so that means...

name: Jonathan
message: Let's move on.
When Thomas went into the room with the prostitute, he slipped out the back door and secretly went somewhere else.

name: Cordelia
message: Then, was he meeting Nai at the Church of Dagon？

name: Jonathan
message: He planned everything from the start, even set up an alibi, so there's no way those two are unrelated.
And, you were actually raised at the Church of Dagon too, Cordelia.
The fact that she was gone last night might not be unrelated either.
Cordelia doesn't even know she was raised at the church.
It would be easy to sneak her out in the middle of the night and make her lose her memory afterwards.
What should I do.........
Should I tell Cordelia about this?
I'm also bothered by what Hans, the general store owner, said-that the villagers treated Cordelia specially.
ナイとダゴン教団が何を企んでいるのか、コーデリアや私はその企てにどういう形で巻き込まれているのか‥‥‥‥
Was Cordelia's inexplicable, sleepwalking-like behavior last night just a coincidence?

name: Cordelia
message: ダゴン教団て何をしようとしているのかしら。
Somehow, this is scary......

name: Jonathan
message: Even now that I've come this far, I have absolutely no idea what Thomas and Nai are thinking.

name: Cordelia
message: Then why don't you just stop hanging out with Thomas...　　　　　　　　That way, you wouldn't have to worry anymore.

name: Jonathan
message: We can't even escape from Arkham.　　　　Keeping Thomas away won't change anything.

name: Jonathan
message: Besides, we’re already up to our necks in this mess.
In　that　case,　we’ll　just　use　that　guy　ourselves.

name: Cordelia
message: That's dangerous, is there really any need to cross such a risky bridge？　　　　　　　　Jonathan, let's just stop already.

name: Cordelia
message: Let's forget everything and leave the village together.
The suspension bridge will work out somehow, I mean, we haven't even tried it yet, so we don't really know if it's actually dangerous.

name: Jonathan
message: I can't. I can't stop.
If I happened to be connected to the Dunwich family, then the blood of a murderer-just like Dollie's-would be flowing through me too.

name: Jonathan
message: You never know when, where, or what kind of shit might go down.
I need to know why Dollie tried to wipe out her own bloodline.　　　　　　　　I can't go without knowing the reason.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan...

name: Jonathan
message: I wonder why Dollie did something like that.
I　can't　help　but　feel　like　it　has　something　to　do　with　my　distant　ancestors　from　Arkham.

name: Cordelia
message: 解ったわ、あなたの気の済むまでおやりなさい。
I'll help too.

name: Cordelia
message: But you know, stop doing that kind of thing already！

name: Jonathan
message: What do you mean by something like that？

name: Cordelia
message: With another woman besides me......
Let alone spending money to buy that kind of woman.

name: Jonathan
message: That's why...

name: Cordelia
message: It doesn't matter, it doesn't change the fact that Jonathan trampled all over my heart.

name: Cordelia
message: How was it？
As a pro, it must've felt good for you, right？

name: Jonathan
message: This again?
Didn't I tell you before?

name: Jonathan
message: I can't just not know why Dollie tried to end her own bloodline.

name: Cordelia
message: ...If only the sky was at least clear.

name: Jonathan
message: I feel like I haven't seen the sun in such a long time.

name: Cordelia
message: It's so frustrating.

name: Jonathan
message: About what？

name: Cordelia
message: I thought I'd done my best to live as happily as possible till now.

name: Jonathan
message: ......Let's get out of here. The vibe here is just way too bad.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold... Let's just go home already.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, let's call the professor and Thomas.

name: Cordelia
message: Coming here reminds me of Mr. Marsh.
I　still　can't　forget　what　I　saw　back　then.........

name: Jonathan
message: You should stop feeling sorry for Marsh. We never know when we could end up like that too.

name: Cordelia
message: You mean us？
Why do we have to go through something like that?

name: Jonathan
message: Marsh wasn't killed just to shut him up.
That was a warning meant for us.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, let's just stop, okay？
It’s not good to keep putting ourselves in danger like this.

name: Jonathan
message: Why are you saying this all of a sudden?
Don't you want to know why you were brought to Arkham?

name: Cordelia
message: That's enough.
More importantly, what's really important is that Jonathan is safe.

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia.........

name: Jonathan
message: I can't. I can't stop.
If I were connected to the Dunwich family, then that would mean the same murderer’s blood as Dollie’s is flowing through me too.

name: Jonathan
message: You never know when, where, or what might happen.
どうしてドルリイが自分の血を絶やそうとしたのか、　　　　　　　　その理由を知らない訳にはいかない。

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan...

name: Jonathan
message: I wonder why Dollie did something like that.
I can't help but feel like it has something to do with one of my distant ancestors from Arkham.

name: Cordelia
message: Got it, do whatever you want until you're satisfied.
I'll help out too.
